summary.para: Handles global accelerators so that input objects can respond to the keyboard even when they are not active in the UI.

param.name: pMsg
param.para: A pointer to an structure that contains a keyboard message.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that extends by handling global accelerators.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
